name: lighthouse-dashboard
description: Easy create and manage Google Lighthouse Reports

scripts.merge-dev:staging: git checkout staging && git merge dev
scripts.merge-staging:heroku: git checkout heroku && git merge staging
scripts.merge-staging:netlify: git checkout netlify && git merge staging
scripts.deploy:client: merge-dev:staging && merge-staging:netlify && git push origin netlify && git checkout staging
scripts.deploy:server: merge-dev:staging && merge-staging:heroku && git subtree push --prefix server heroku master && git checkout staging

author: Jeremy Bratcher
